```{r}
library(qcc)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
x <- read.csv("../datasets/vex.csv")
str(x)

x$Points

summary(x$Points)

ggplot(dat = x, aes(x = Run, y = Points, color = Date)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + 
  ggtitle("Points Scored over Time")

ggplot(dat = x, aes(x = Points)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 20)
boxplot(x$Points)
```
